Posts.Content: hello everyone  this is my first post. Im having my first chemo 3rd sept. and i am really frightened..its FEC-T and ive got a pre chemo chat 27th august. i cannot sleep for the worry of how it will go and my main worry is chemo brain, although the whole thing is really scary to me. i live on my own and ive arranged for my dog to be looked after for a while as im frightened of infections and managing him generally as he his very boisterous. My family are not interested in my BC and i feel very isolated. I do have one good friend but she is not ever so well herself but does what she can.
Posts.Title: *** August Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: thank you susie you have made me feel a bit more in touch with things and i will take your advice and maybe ill will try the cold cap. not being able to function is what im most worried about as i had a stroke years ago although im ok now in that respect. i will look at the cancer research page.  loulou85 x
Posts.Title: *** August Chemo Club ***
